title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater (video game)
summary: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater, released as Tony Hawk's Skateboarding in the UK, Australia, New Zealand and parts of Europe, is a skateboarding video game developed by Neversoft and published by Activision. It was released for the PlayStation on September 29, 1999[1] and was later ported to the Nintendo 64, Game Boy Color, Dreamcast, and N-Gage.
